Validations: Don't do anything in Query Mode:
Client is mandatory:
Client not found in client administration:

Debtor client is mandatory:
Unknown debtor client

At least one of the three amount fields is mandatory:
-- If no errors occured => save record:
:End: Skip all validations in Query mode
How to proceed after having handled the record:
If a NEW record was created, then restart with empty screen for next new record:
... but if a record was just queried or modified=>go back to overview table:
